dispatcher.doc: The config of this application, with a namespace so it can be merged into larger configs

api.doc: RabbitMQ web api url. Management plugin must be installed. Uses rabbitmq hostname if omitted.

queue.doc: The default queue name used by rabbitmq

exchange.doc: The default exchange name used by rabbitmq. Note empty string has special meaning

shovel.doc: The default shovel name used by rabbitmq
